DOC.brief_summary: Pilot study of Zoledronic acid in combination with first-line chemotherapy in aged patients with lung cancer. The purpose is to assess the effects of Zoledronic acid in combination with first-line chemotherapy in aged patients with lung cancer on bone mineral density gain in the lumbar spine and total hip.
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study of Zoledronic Acid in Combination With First-line Chemotherapy in Aged Patients With Lung Cancer
